rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a spacious lounge area that adheres to Vastu principles by orienting towards the east for positive energy.
Modern kitchen designed with Art Deco elements and functional workspaces, ensuring proper ventilation and adherence to local building norms.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the lounge, providing a seamless flow between spaces.
Well-equipped bathroom with modern finishes and accessibility features as per local guidelines.

openings.features: Art Deco styled door with glass accents and proper ventilation windows to align with Vastu principles.
Corner plot advantage utilized for a balcony overlooking the street, designed in Art Deco style.

levels.comments: Design incorporates Vastu principles by positioning living spaces in favorable directions and ensuring balanced sunlight. The Art Deco elements are highlighted in doorways and window trims, while local building norms are observed with appropriate room dimensions and safety features.
